## Analysis of 'mpg Dataset

```{r}
# Load required library
library(tidyverse)

# Inspect dataset to ensure it's available
head(mpg)

# Scatter plot
ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
  labs(
    title = "Engine Displacement vs Highway MPG",
    x = "Engine Displacement",
    y = "Highway MPG"
  )
